Talon/Perceptor/Elita:

A quiet steps walked towards Tucson. Talon slowly lay a hand in his shoulder 
and she said "Maybe is the best, we must find the way to separate your 
essence from the Matrix, before you attemp to do it"

Perceptor had followed Talon, and he stopped close to Megatron, eventought 
he never questioned himself some inner conflic could be sensed for those 
whoever sensitive enough.

"This is an ironic world..."said almost with indecition "and life sometimes 
is a joke  and I would be laugthing if I dont doubt about my decitions"

Talon looked puzzled at perceptor

*************************
Elita looked at Straight  shot and said "Straight shot... do you think that 
my mom will be soon with us??? "

**************************

Nightligh tried to make a big sfort to sit down but her energy levels, on 
purpose, were to low for that, she stopped too weak to move and said 
"Rodimus... Are you you?... Is that nightmare finaly over????"
-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, May 30, 2011 1:03 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: the ARK to awaken from sleep!

> <OLD>
>
> He kneels next to the body of Optimus Prime, as a strong desire to do so, 
> compells him to place a hand upon his chest, where his Matrix lays 
> dorment. He did not know what to expect but something was telling him to 
> do exactly what he was doing.
>
> "I - think I may have something that belongs to you."
>

<NEW>

"NO YOU DO NOT" The cold voice of Legacy, the Ark's temporal guardian
can be heard as he stood on the other side of the large form Optimus.
His single cyclopean gaze watched Tuscon unflichingly as the slight
tingling sensation of a forceshield could be seen and felt as it
extended itself over Optimus Prime.

"The Autobots and Decepticons must remain undesturbed." Legacy's voice
is authoritative and final. "Any disrutpution of them, even a
reinfusement of his matrix with any that you contain risks a temporal
contamination."

Legacy began to walk towards Tuscon, "I do not know what you intend to
do Tuscon." Legacy gestured towads the other fallen Autobots and
Decepticons in the room, "But it is my primary function to protect
them and their role in the temporal unfolding that is to come, to
protect not just the present but the future that is to come. Whatever
your plan, it cannot involve them."

(TAG)

Preston
